definition: to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: And a touch of femininity, such as a bow headband can be added to tone down the masculinity.
sentences.chinese: 也可以使用束发带之类的饰品来增加女生的柔美。

sentences.english: Where did you find my ski headband?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪里找到我的滑雪束发带？

sentences.english: I know the full value of the snood.
sentences.chinese: 我懂得束发带的全部涵义。

sentences.english: The soldiers in the vanguard wear short suits, have their hair in buns and hold bows.
sentences.chinese: 士兵身穿短褐，勒带束发，手执弓弩，背负箭囊。

definition: hair worn in a bun or coil
hair rolled up in a bun, topknot
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
fine black hair/dried plum (sliced, as cake ingredient)
